title: Thailand - Tourist/Visit Visa
processing_time: 40–45 working days (Embassy dependent) + 2–3 days file processing

details.title: Eligibility
items: Bangladeshi citizens holding a passport valid for at least 6 months from the date of travel.
Must apply for tourist, medical, or business visas only.
Applicants must provide financial proof and relevant documents based on occupation.

details.title: Required Documents
items: Passport scan copy (valid minimum 6 months from travel date)
Recent photograph (35x45 mm, white background, no caps/glasses)
Visiting card and office ID card
Bank statement (last 6 months) and bank solvency certificate (minimum BDT 80,000 per person)
Marriage certificate (notarized and English translated) – if spouse's name not in passport
For Job Holders: NOC with salary details, office ID card (both sides), GO (for Govt. officials), BMDC (Doctors), BAR Council (Advocates), Retirement Certificate (Retired person)
For Business Owners: Office pad (blank), renewed trade license (translated + notarized), memorandum (for limited companies)
For Students: Student ID (both sides), NOC from institution, birth certificate
Sponsor-based applicants must submit sponsor’s occupation-specific documents
